archimate:Requirement.name: SA.2.1.3f: f) agreed contracts should be in place, which are signed off by an appropriate business manager (e.g. the individual in charge of the business application being accessed).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
